text: This is a list of Mayors of Bath, a city in the county of Somerset, England, since the first recorded mayoralty in 1230. The mayor for the municipal year beginning 6 June 2020 is Manda Rigby, who is the 793rd mayor.Bathnewseum The Mayor of Bath in 1964 was Councillor Miss Kathleen Harper, the first woman to hold the office ==Pre-21st century== Source: Mayor's Office, Bath Ralph Allen.
